name: DIBS Incremental
description:
Dungeon Incremental Battle Simulator!

SAVING / LOADING IS BROKEN FOR THE WEB BUILD CURRENTLY (although the web version has a few bug fixes related to the inventory)

Shift + Click to quickly trash inventory.

Click the backpack icon to open/close inventory.  Character Tab is not yet implemented (unless you count a picture of a skeleton as being implemented).  Compendium and Options are not yet implemented either.

This is a ~45 minute alpha version of my game.  Unfortunately, will not have much time to be working on this game for the foreseeable future, so I am releasing it to the community in its current state.  There may be some smallish updates in the future, but I can't make any promises.

Lots of things have tooltips for more information (enemies, stats, equipment, etc).
